jasmine.name: jasmine
jasmine.description: Delicate white floral with bright citric lift and perfumed aroma; common in high-elevation washed Ethiopians.

orange_blossom.name: orange_blossom
orange_blossom.description: Sweet citrus-floral with honeyed lift and orange-zest aroma; prominent in naturals with high aromatic retention.

rose.name: rose
rose.description: Soft red floral with perfume-like sweetness; often layered over berry/tropical fruit in naturals.

lavender.name: lavender
lavender.description: Purple floral with fragrant sweetness and herbal undertones; aromatic and short-lived.

elderflower.name: elderflower
elderflower.description: White floral with grape-like sweetness and delicate texture; common in clean washed profiles.

chamomile.name: chamomile
chamomile.description: Yellow floral with apple-like sweetness and fluffy dryness; bridges floral and herbal.

violet.name: violet
violet.description: Powdery purple floral with parma‑violet candy nuance; subtle but distinctive top-note.

honeysuckle.name: honeysuckle
honeysuckle.description: Sweet, nectar‑like yellow floral with soft texture and lingering honeyed finish.

osmanthus.name: osmanthus
osmanthus.description: Elegant white floral with peach‑like sweetness; sits between floral and stone‑fruit.

lily.name: lily
lily.description: Clean white floral with aquatic brightness and smooth, light mouthfeel; subtle but distinct.

tuberose.name: tuberose
tuberose.description: Dense tropical white floral with creamy body and perfumed intensity; aroma‑forward.

freesia.name: freesia
freesia.description: Delicate floral with a faint fruity twist; light and refreshing top‑note.

hibiscus.name: hibiscus
hibiscus.description: Tart red floral bridging floral and berry acidity; more tactile/acid‑driven than perfumy.

tulip.name: tulip
tulip.description: Fresh-cut floral with green and mildly spicy top-notes. Rare in coffee but cited in Nordic washed lots.

magnolia.name: magnolia
magnolia.description: Waxy white floral with creamy texture and banana-laced aromatics. Appears in co-ferments and sweet anaerobics.

orchid.name: orchid
orchid.description: Tropical floral with soft perfume and vanilla-like undertones. Rare but present in high-altitude naturals.

lilac.name: lilac
lilac.description: Delicate purple floral with cool, airy notes and a clean powdery edge. Rare but known in Kenya SL28s.

fennel_flower.name: fennel_flower
fennel_flower.description: Green-floral crossover with sweet spice undertone; may lean toward savory herb in medium roasts.

basil_flower.name: basil_flower
basil_flower.description: Herbaceous floral with green-sweet tone and mild floral bite; noted in some semi-washed centrals.

wildflower.name: wildflower
wildflower.description: Mixed floral note — complex, pollen-like, lightly sweet and hard to isolate. Common in high-elevation naturals.

geranium.name: geranium
geranium.description: Sharp-edged floral with leafy green and spicy rose-like facets. More common in older Ethiopian lots.

sage_blossom.name: sage_blossom
sage_blossom.description: Savory-edge floral with green herbal crossover and dried spice undertones.

daisy.name: daisy
daisy.description: Dry, faint yellow floral with hay-like base and grassy finish. Often too subtle to isolate.

frangipani.name: frangipani
frangipani.description: Tropical floral with creamy perfume and subtle fruity base. Present in some high-ester naturals.

mimosa.name: mimosa
mimosa.description: Fluffy yellow floral with citrus zest lift and effervescent sweetness. Found in bright, fermenty cups.

marigold.name: marigold
marigold.description: Dry yellow floral with bitter green and dusty edges. Hints of pollen and herb.

lotus.name: lotus
lotus.description: Aquatic floral with smooth mouthfeel and subtle green-floral tone. Used as reference in delicate cups.

carnation.name: carnation
carnation.description: Clove-like floral with warm spice backnote. Rare but can appear in older dry-process lots.

acacia.name: acacia
acacia.description: Soft white floral with honey-like sweetness and very subtle top note. Found in washed East African lots.

calla_lily.name: calla_lily
calla_lily.description: Clean white floral with very light, almost soapy tone. Rare reference in Nordic washed styles.

anise_flower.name: anise_flower
anise_flower.description: Floral-spice hybrid with fennel-like character and light sweetness. Associated with dried spices in naturals.

dandelion.name: dandelion
dandelion.description: Wild yellow flower with faint bitterness and hay-like edge. Tactile note more than aromatic.

peach.name: peach
peach.description: Juicy stone fruit with soft sweetness and smooth acidity. Often found in natural Ethiopian and Colombian coffees.

apricot.name: apricot
apricot.description: Sweet-dry stone fruit with soft acidity and faint floral edge. Common in washed Ethiopian profiles.

plum.name: plum
plum.description: Darker stone fruit with jammy body and light tannic depth. Appears in natural and anaerobic lots.

blueberry.name: blueberry
blueberry.description: Dark berry with jammy sweetness and purple floral edge. Often found in dry-process or fermented profiles.

raspberry.name: raspberry
raspberry.description: Red berry with sharp acidity and floral-sweet finish. Appears in washed and honey-processed lots.

green_apple.name: green_apple
green_apple.description: Crisp, malic acidity with refreshing snap. Common in washed Kenya and Ethiopia.

mango.name: mango
mango.description: Tropical fruit with creamy sweetness and soft acidity. Found in naturals and co-ferments.

lychee.name: lychee
lychee.description: Fragrant tropical fruit with floral lift and silky sweetness. High in esters and glycosides.

passionfruit.name: passionfruit
passionfruit.description: Sharp tropical fruit with tart acidity and vibrant aromatics. Common in anaerobics and carbonics.

strawberry.name: strawberry
strawberry.description: Sweet red berry with floral overtones. Can appear as jammy, candy-like, or fresh depending on processing.

cranberry.name: cranberry
cranberry.description: Tart red fruit with wine-like acidity and dry mouthfeel. Common in high-grown washed Kenya lots.

red_apple.name: red_apple
red_apple.description: Sweeter and softer than green apple, with malic acidity and round body. Found in mild washed profiles.

white_grape.name: white_grape
white_grape.description: Crisp, clean acidity with light sweetness and subtle floral backing. Found in washed Ethiopian cups.

blackberry.name: blackberry
blackberry.description: Dark berry with a soft tartness and ripe purple fruit core. Appears in naturals and dry fermentation.

pear.name: pear
pear.description: Clean, soft sweetness with watery texture and faint green floral edge. Common in washed profiles.

golden_kiwi.name: golden_kiwi
golden_kiwi.description: Tropical citrus-berry crossover with smooth acidity and syrupy body. Present in modern co-ferments.

pineapple.name: pineapple
pineapple.description: Sharp tropical acidity with sugary base and bright top notes. Found in anaerobics and high-heat naturals.

fig.name: fig
fig.description: Rich dried fruit with chewy texture and molasses-like depth. Found in natural or aged coffees.

prune.name: prune
prune.description: Dense, cooked dark fruit with soft tannins and syrupy sweetness. Often appears in aged or overdeveloped naturals.

red_grape.name: red_grape
red_grape.description: Juicier and rounder than white grape, with wine-like acidity and soft tannins. Found in semi-washed and naturals.

concord_grape.name: concord_grape
concord_grape.description: Dark, jammy grape note with sweet tangy finish. Often evokes grape jelly or candy in high-ester naturals.

raisin.name: raisin
raisin.description: Dried fruit with soft sweetness and muted acidity. Appears in aged naturals and long-dried lots.

dried_cherry.name: dried_cherry
dried_cherry.description: Dehydrated red fruit with dense sweetness and soft tannin. Common in slow-dried naturals.

pomegranate.name: pomegranate
pomegranate.description: Bright red fruit with tart acidity and tannic finish. Noted in Kenya and anaerobic cups.

soursop.name: soursop
soursop.description: Tropical creamy-acidic fruit with milky base and citrus aroma. Occasionally cupped in African co-ferments.

tamarind.name: tamarind
tamarind.description: Sour-sweet pulp note with dark fruit density and sharp acidity. Cited in Indonesian and anaerobic lots.

cantaloupe.name: cantaloupe
cantaloupe.description: Light melon note with soft sweetness and watery mouthfeel. Present in East African washed lots.

honeydew.name: honeydew
honeydew.description: Mild green melon with soft body and mellow sweetness. Shows up in washed coffees with low bitterness.

gooseberry.name: gooseberry
gooseberry.description: Tart pome-fruit with green sourness and bright, citrusy snap. Present in Kenya and anaerobics.

lemon.name: lemon
lemon.description: Bright yellow citrus with sharp acidity and clean aroma. Common in washed coffees with high malic/citric profiles.

lime.name: lime
lime.description: Green citrus with pungent aroma and piercing acidity. Appears in East African washed coffees.

orange.name: orange
orange.description: Round, sweet citrus with juicy texture and soft acidity. Found in Colombian and Central American naturals.

orange_zest.name: orange_zest
orange_zest.description: Concentrated citrus oil note with spicy edge and bitter-sweet lift. Appears in anaerobics and high-temp roasts.

grapefruit.name: grapefruit
grapefruit.description: Bitter-sour citrus with dry edge and lingering tartness. Found in washed Kenyan and SL28 cups.

mandarin.name: mandarin
mandarin.description: Sweeter, floral orange variant with soft body and mild zest. Cupped in mild naturals or anaerobics.

bergamot.name: bergamot
bergamot.description: Citrus-floral hybrid note with tea-like fragrance. Present in floral-centric anaerobic lots.

yuzu.name: yuzu
yuzu.description: Complex Japanese citrus with tart-sweet profile and floral undertones. Rare, but cited in carbonic/co-ferments.

calamansi.name: calamansi
calamansi.description: Filipino citrus with hybrid profile — tart lime body with mandarin sweetness. Noted in tropical co-ferments.

lemongrass.name: lemongrass
lemongrass.description: Sharp, herbal-citrus note with grassy freshness and high aromatic volatility. Cupped in ferment-forward coffees.

citron.name: citron
citron.description: Ancient citrus with intensely fragrant rind and bitter zest. Occasionally noted in spiced anaerobics.

blood_orange.name: blood_orange
blood_orange.description: Darker orange variant with red berry undertones and mild acidity. Shows up in fruit-heavy naturals.

pomelo.name: pomelo
pomelo.description: Large citrus with soft bitterness and gentle sweetness. Sometimes noted as mellow grapefruit.

kumquat.name: kumquat
kumquat.description: Small citrus with edible skin, combining zest bitterness and juicy tang. Found in bright anaerobics.

brown_sugar.name: brown_sugar
brown_sugar.description: Dark cane sugar with molasses undertone and damp sweetness. Appears in medium-roast naturals.

molasses.name: molasses
molasses.description: Heavy, bittersweet sugar residue with earthy depth. Found in long-dried naturals or aged coffees.

raw_sugar.name: raw_sugar
raw_sugar.description: Unrefined sugar note with clean sweetness and dry finish. Common in washed Centrals.

sugarcane.name: sugarcane
sugarcane.description: Vegetal sweetness with light mineral finish and fibrous mouthfeel. Found in Colombian washed lots.

white_sugar.name: white_sugar
white_sugar.description: Refined sweetness with minimal aroma or texture. Acts as a clean sugar baseline in many washed cups.

caramel.name: caramel
caramel.description: Toasty sweetness with browned sugar depth. Appears in honey-processed and medium-roast coffees.

maple.name: maple
maple.description: Sweet syrup with earthy and smoky undertones. Rare, but cupped in barrel-aged or anaerobic coffees.

honey.name: honey
honey.description: Viscous sweetness with floral top-notes and rich mid-palate. Prominent in honey-process or floral coffees.

syrup.name: syrup
syrup.description: General sweetness with coating mouthfeel and little aroma. Neutral carrier for other flavour notes.

vanilla.name: vanilla
vanilla.description: Soft aromatic sweetness with creamy base and floral lift. Found in naturals, barrel-aged, and low-acid coffees.

cotton_candy.name: cotton_candy
cotton_candy.description: Burnt-sugar sweetness with volatile lift and zero body. Found in over-expressed natural anaerobics.

butterscotch.name: butterscotch
butterscotch.description: Rich creamy-sugar note with buttery undertones. Found in medium-roast Central Americans and naturals.

marshmallow.name: marshmallow
marshmallow.description: Fluffy, sweet-vanilla note with mild coating texture. Common in coffees with high perceived smoothness.

nougat.name: nougat
nougat.description: Nutty-confectionary sweetness with fluffy sugar body. Found in nut-driven naturals and long-dried Centrals.

white_chocolate.name: white_chocolate
white_chocolate.description: Creamy, sweet-milky note with no cocoa bitterness. Found in lightly roasted Brazilian naturals.

milk_chocolate.name: milk_chocolate
milk_chocolate.description: Smooth chocolate note with soft cocoa and added sweetness. Common in Latin American washed coffees.

toffee.name: toffee
toffee.description: Burnt-butter sugar with chewy density and warm nutty edge. Found in long-dried naturals or medium-dark roasts.

fudge.name: fudge
fudge.description: Dense, buttery-sweet note with chocolate undertones. Sometimes found in high-body Indonesian coffees.

icing_sugar.name: icing_sugar
icing_sugar.description: Finely powdered sugar with dry sweetness and rapid melt. Rare in coffee but noted in high-clarity naturals.

frosting.name: frosting
frosting.description: Creamy sweet note with thick body and artificial vanilla tone. Noted in anaerobic and co-ferment lots.

condensed_milk.name: condensed_milk
condensed_milk.description: Sweet dairy note with sticky body and cooked-sugar finish. Found in Asian-style and long-fermented naturals.

custard.name: custard
custard.description: Eggy-vanilla sweetness with creamy richness and dense mouthfeel. Found in co-ferments with fruit and lactics.

pudding.name: pudding
pudding.description: Dense, neutral-to-sweet base note with starchy smoothness. Found in fermented naturals and creamy-bodied lots.

honeycomb.name: honeycomb
honeycomb.description: Crisp toffee-like sweet with airy bitterness. Appears in caramel-heavy naturals and dark honey processes.

sweetened_condensed.name: sweetened_condensed
sweetened_condensed.description: Highly sweet, thickened milk syrup. Notes of cooked sugar and vanilla. Referenced in Asian-style cups.

sugar_syrup.name: sugar_syrup
sugar_syrup.description: Neutral sweet coating with no aroma and high viscosity. Used as base descriptor for sweetness.

cream.name: cream
cream.description: Rich dairy sweetness with smooth fat finish. Often perceived as 'milky body' or 'coating' in cupping.

clove.name: clove
clove.description: Dry, pungent spice with sweet-phenolic edge. Found in naturals, anaerobics, and woody centrals.

cinnamon.name: cinnamon
cinnamon.description: Warm spice with sweet heat and woody dryness. Common in naturals and mid-roast Latin American cups.

nutmeg.name: nutmeg
nutmeg.description: Warming spice with rich, musky undertone and creamy lift. Found in warm-bodied naturals and spiced lots.

allspice.name: allspice
allspice.description: Spice blend note with facets of clove, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Rare but referenced in aged or spiced lots.

anise.name: anise
anise.description: Sweet spice with licorice-like edge and cooling aftertaste. Appears in fruit-ferments and Ethiopian profiles.

mace.name: mace
mace.description: Delicate aromatic spice from nutmeg aril. Floral-sweet and slightly sharp. Rare but cupped in floral naturals.

licorice.name: licorice
licorice.description: Dense, bittersweet spice note with earthy sweetness and herbal cooling. Found in naturals with herbal fermentation.

gingerbread.name: gingerbread
gingerbread.description: Warming sweet spice blend with molasses, cinnamon, and ginger tones. Referenced in long-ferment naturals.

spiced_rum.name: spiced_rum
spiced_rum.description: Sweet alcohol-inspired note with clove, vanilla, and caramel overlap. Common in barrel-aged or ferment-forward lots.

cardamom.name: cardamom
cardamom.description: Aromatic green spice with floral, citrus, and minty tones. Noted in washed Ethiopian and Yemeni cups.

ginger.name: ginger
ginger.description: Sharp spice with warming heat and citrus-zest lift. Common in Ethiopian and high-clarity washed lots.

black_pepper.name: black_pepper
black_pepper.description: Sharp, dry heat with pungent spice nose. Found in high-acid SL28s and dry anaerobic cups.

white_pepper.name: white_pepper
white_pepper.description: Refined dry heat with muted aroma and subtle pungency. May appear in washed high-grown lots.

coriander_seed.name: coriander_seed
coriander_seed.description: Citrusy-dry spice with light floral spice edge. Occasionally cited in washed lots with green-herb overlap.

cumin.name: cumin
cumin.description: Warm earthy spice with dry body and bitter tail. Rare, but found in aged coffees or barrel-ferment profiles.

turmeric.name: turmeric
turmeric.description: Earthy yellow spice with bitter edge and chalky texture. Found in woody cups with strong drying character.

caraway.name: caraway
caraway.description: Dry seed spice with earthy-spice aroma and subtle minty lift. Found in woody/nutty naturals.

fennel_seed.name: fennel_seed
fennel_seed.description: Sweet-herb spice with anise-like lift and green edge. Appears in herbal naturals and Asian-influenced co-ferments.

fenugreek.name: fenugreek
fenugreek.description: Bitter-sweet dry spice with maple and curry-like notes. Rare, but cited in spice-heavy naturals.

thyme.name: thyme
thyme.description: Dry herbal spice with earthy and slightly minty profile. Found in woody naturals and herbal-ferment lots.

sage.name: sage
sage.description: Savory herb with bitter-edged dryness and slight resinous body. Found in woody and spice-led cups.

rosemary.name: rosemary
rosemary.description: Pine-like herbaceous spice with floral-resin edge. Appears in dry naturals and rustic washed cups.

dried_oregano.name: dried_oregano
dried_oregano.description: Sharp, bitter herbal note with Mediterranean spice character. Rare but present in wild fermented cups.

bay_leaf.name: bay_leaf
bay_leaf.description: Aromatic dry leaf spice with woody, bitter-sweet aroma. Rare in coffee, but present in complex spice profiles.

curry_leaf.name: curry_leaf
curry_leaf.description: Savory spice leaf with nutty, earthy, and lightly citrus aroma. Rare but cupped in Asian experimental profiles.

herbal.name: herbal
herbal.description: General dry-herb tone with light bitterness, grassy lift, and tea-like dryness. Common in washed and woody cups.

tea_like.name: tea_like
tea_like.description: Subtle, drying note with floral-green dryness and faint bitterness. Common in East African washed profiles.

woody_spice.name: woody_spice
woody_spice.description: Dry, rough-edged spice backbone with bark-like aromatics. Often used to describe harsh spice under-roast.

smoked_spice.name: smoked_spice
smoked_spice.description: Smoky-spiced note with charred edge and dry wood bitterness. Common in over-roasted or fire-dried coffees.

hazelnut.name: hazelnut
hazelnut.description: Classic nutty note with creamy, toasted edge. Common in Latin American coffees and balanced medium roasts.

almond.name: almond
almond.description: Dry nutty note with slight sweetness and bitter-skin edge. Common in washed Central Americans and some Ethiopians.

peanut.name: peanut
peanut.description: Dry, dusty nut note with mild sweetness and high roast sensitivity. Found in long-dried naturals and underdeveloped roasts.

cashew.name: cashew
cashew.description: Buttery nut with low bitterness and soft sweetness. Noted in clean honey-processed and low-acid cups.

walnut.name: walnut
walnut.description: Tannic, bitter nut with earthy base and mild sweetness. Found in aged coffees or woody naturals.

pistachio.name: pistachio
pistachio.description: Greenish nut note with creamy texture and mild floral lift. Rare but cupped in sweet naturals.

chestnut.name: chestnut
chestnut.description: Soft nutty note with starchy body and low oil. Perceived in full-city roasts and aged naturals.

brazil_nut.name: brazil_nut
brazil_nut.description: Large creamy nut with woody-fatty body. Occasionally cupped in long-dried naturals.

sunflower_seed.name: sunflower_seed
sunflower_seed.description: Dry seed-nut hybrid with toasty grain edge and low sweetness. Found in nut-heavy profiles and aged cups.

pecan.name: pecan
pecan.description: Sweet, rich nut with buttery body and caramel edge. Found in full naturals and pecan-pie-like profiles.

macadamia.name: macadamia
macadamia.description: High-fat creamy nut with low bitterness and rounded sweet body. Perceived in soft-bodied naturals.

pine_nut.name: pine_nut
pine_nut.description: Soft, waxy nut with subtle sweetness and herbal edge. Rare, but cupped in high-elevation naturals.

roasted_almond.name: roasted_almond
roasted_almond.description: Dry, toasted almond profile with crisp edge and mild bitterness. Appears in medium-dark roasted lots.

roasted_hazelnut.name: roasted_hazelnut
roasted_hazelnut.description: Developed hazelnut profile with deeper oils and nut skin edge. Found in deeper roasts and Brazil naturals.

nut_skin.name: nut_skin
nut_skin.description: Dry, slightly bitter edge of nut character. Appears in underdeveloped roast or sharp tannic cups.

brittle.name: brittle
brittle.description: Crunchy, sugar-coated nut note with sharp caramel finish. Rare, but cupped in long-fermented anaerobics.

burnt_nut.name: burnt_nut
burnt_nut.description: Charred, overdeveloped nut note with bitterness and smoky dryness. Found in overroasts or fire-dried naturals.

nut_oil.name: nut_oil
nut_oil.description: Fatty, rich aroma resembling cold-pressed nut oils. Found in high-body coffees and late-extraction segments.

peanut_butter.name: peanut_butter
peanut_butter.description: Dense, fatty-smooth peanut note with mild sweetness and chalky finish. Found in heavy-bodied naturals.

cashew_butter.name: cashew_butter
cashew_butter.description: Creamy, sweet nut paste with high fat and soft edge. Found in high-coating, sweet naturals.

marzipan.name: marzipan
marzipan.description: Sweet almond paste with floral almond aroma and smooth body. Cupped in dessert-like coffees and co-ferments.

praline.name: praline
praline.description: Nut-caramel blend with crystalline sugar and roasted depth. Common in pecan-influenced profiles.

burnt_peanut_butter.name: burnt_peanut_butter
burnt_peanut_butter.description: Overdeveloped peanut-butter note with bitter edge and smoky finish. Found in roast artifacts or fire-dried naturals.

hazelnut_butter.name: hazelnut_butter
hazelnut_butter.description: Smooth nut spread with high sweetness and creamy finish. Cupped in dessert-heavy anaerobics.

nut_milk.name: nut_milk
nut_milk.description: Diluted nutty note with creamy aroma and thin mouthfeel. Cupped in low-tannin naturals with almond or cashew expression.

salted_nut.name: salted_nut
salted_nut.description: Savory-sweet nut note with saline edge. Occasionally cupped in co-ferments or fermentation-assisted body profiles.

toast.name: toast
toast.description: Dry, golden-brown heat note with mild sweetness and crusty finish. Found in medium roasts and honey processes.

roast_crust.name: roast_crust
roast_crust.description: Dry, brittle surface roast note resembling baked crust. Cupped in well-developed washed or honey roasts.

cocoa.name: cocoa
cocoa.description: Dry chocolate note with bitter-dusty edge. Found in many washed lots and medium-dark roasts.

burnt_sugar.name: burnt_sugar
burnt_sugar.description: Sharp, bitter caramelized sugar with dry finish. Appears in roast-heavy or long-ferment cups.

grain.name: grain
grain.description: Toasty, dry cereal note with clean finish and little sweetness. Common in washed coffees and light roasts.

crust.name: crust
crust.description: Thick, dry heat note with a firm edge and low sweetness. Found in medium roast washed lots.

dry_cocoa.name: dry_cocoa
dry_cocoa.description: Chalky, unsweetened cocoa with light roast edge. Often perceived in sharp washed coffees.

roast_barley.name: roast_barley
roast_barley.description: Toasty-cereal note with dry bitter finish. Noted in malty cups and underdeveloped naturals.

baked_note.name: baked_note
baked_note.description: Flat, dry roast expression lacking sweetness or acidity. Common in underdeveloped roast curves.

char.name: char
char.description: Sharp carbonized note with bitter edge and lingering dryness. Cupped in over-roasted or fire-dried coffees.

ash.name: ash
ash.description: Dusty, spent-carbon note with papery texture. Found in severely over-roasted or scorched lots.

smoke.name: smoke
smoke.description: Aromatic burn note with phenolic lift and dry bitterness. Found in fire-dried naturals and long roasts.

burnt_wood.name: burnt_wood
burnt_wood.description: Charred wood tone with dry bitterness and resin edge. Found in extreme drying profiles or roast defects.

tobacco.name: tobacco
tobacco.description: Dry, leathery spice note with bitter sweetness. Cupped in long-roasted lots or aged naturals.

leather.name: leather
leather.description: Heavy, worn aroma with smoky and sweet edge. Found in aged, barrel-influenced, or rustic naturals.

charcoal.name: charcoal
charcoal.description: Refined carbonic note with dry bitter finish and minimal aroma. Found in barrel-aged or roast-edge cups.

creosote.name: creosote
creosote.description: Pungent, tar-like aroma with phenolic bite. Appears in scorched roasts or smoke-tainted cups.

wood.name: wood
wood.description: Neutral dry-structural note resembling untreated wood. Found in aged lots and dry naturals.

cedar.name: cedar
cedar.description: Aromatic wood note with dry spice lift. Often cupped in aged or barrel-influenced naturals.

malt.name: malt
malt.description: Sweet cereal note with dry finish and soft bitterness. Found in roast barley or aged naturals.

earthy.name: earthy
earthy.description: Petrichor-like dry soil aroma. Found in rustic naturals or old storage conditions.

bark.name: bark
bark.description: Fibrous, tannic roast note resembling tree bark. Cupped in woody naturals or underdeveloped roasts.

firewood.name: firewood
firewood.description: Aromatic woodsmoke note with warm edge. Common in fire-dried naturals or smoked post-process lots.

malted_cereal.name: malted_cereal
malted_cereal.description: Sweet, powdery grain note with dry body. Found in malt-heavy washed cups and barley-linked naturals.

roast_oil.name: roast_oil
roast_oil.description: Oily surface note from dark roast expression. May carry mild bitterness and heavy mouthfeel.

barrel_note.name: barrel_note
barrel_note.description: Oak-like sweet wood tone with faint alcohol or spice lift. Common in barrel-aged or oak-co-ferment lots.

umami.name: umami
umami.description: General savoury taste with mouth-coating depth and glutamate-like character. Rare but cupped in deep ferment or aged coffees.

soy_sauce.name: soy_sauce
soy_sauce.description: Fermented soy note with umami-laced saltiness and dark depth. Found in heavily fermented co-ferments or aged naturals.

miso.name: miso
miso.description: Salted soybean paste note with rich umami and fermented complexity. Cupped in rare anaerobic or yeast-assisted fermentations.

savory_broth.name: savory_broth
savory_broth.description: Stock-like savoury note with low sweetness and long mouthfeel. Found in very long ferment lots or fungal co-processing.

mushroom.name: mushroom
mushroom.description: Earthy, savory-fungal note with umami-laced dryness. Found in aged coffees or those with natural yeast activity.

shiitake.name: shiitake
shiitake.description: Dense, smoky-umami mushroom note with deep drying impact. Found in fungal-assisted ferment cups.

seaweed.name: seaweed
seaweed.description: Oceanic, umami-heavy note with salt and iodine hints. Rarely cupped, but referenced in extreme co-ferment or marine-style cups.

brothy_funk.name: brothy_funk
brothy_funk.description: Combination of savory depth and microbial funk. Found in over-fermented or yeast-assisted co-ferment coffees.

fermented_savory.name: fermented_savory
fermented_savory.description: Catch-all for savory complexity derived from microbial activity. Perceived as layered salt, umami, and sourness.

yogurt.name: yogurt
yogurt.description: Tart dairy ferment note with smooth body and lactic tang. Common in lactic ferment anaerobics and yeast-assisted naturals.

kefir.name: kefir
kefir.description: Fizzy lactic-dairy note with mild funk and probiotic lift. Cupped in anaerobic or rare triple ferments.

cheese_rind.name: cheese_rind
cheese_rind.description: Savory-funky note resembling washed-rind cheese. Found in overfermented naturals and mixed culture cups.

balsamic.name: balsamic
balsamic.description: Acetic-fermented sweetness with woody depth. Appears in barrel-aged ferment or long anaerobics.

vinegar.name: vinegar
vinegar.description: Sharp, biting acetic acid note with drying impact. Seen in overfermented or spoiled cups.

pickle.name: pickle
pickle.description: Acidic-salty ferment note with tangy sharpness. Rare, but cupped in wild microbial anaerobics.

kombucha.name: kombucha
kombucha.description: Sweet-sour ferment with fizzy and ester-rich lift. Found in SCOBY co-ferment lots or experimental naturals.

carbonic_ferment.name: carbonic_ferment
carbonic_ferment.description: Clean ferment note with fruit sparkle and volatile brightness. Found in sealed-tank anaerobic or wine-inspired processes.

sour_ferment.name: sour_ferment
sour_ferment.description: Generic sour microbial note — perceived as off-acid, tart, or unstable lactic/acetic mix.

overripe_fruit.name: overripe_fruit
overripe_fruit.description: Ferment-driven note with deep, jammy fruit and slight spoilage edge. Found in extended-dry or wild anaerobic cups.

cheesy_funk.name: cheesy_funk
cheesy_funk.description: Pungent, lacto-protein breakdown note with sharp ammonia and salt. Found in overfermented naturals.

barnyard.name: barnyard
barnyard.description: Earthy, manure-adjacent funk. Rarely desired, but cupped in long-aged or extreme ferments.

sweaty.name: sweaty
sweaty.description: Protein-related body odour aroma. Cupped in low-density naturals or uneven ferments.

rotting_fruit.name: rotting_fruit
rotting_fruit.description: Foul ferment note with estery decay and sulfuric overtones. Cupped in microbial crash or defected storage.

sulfur.name: sulfur
sulfur.description: Burnt egg or volcanic smell, usually from bacterial crash. Rare and undesirable off-note.

spoiled_funk.name: spoiled_funk
spoiled_funk.description: Catch-all note for non-specific microbial spoilage. Perceived as wrong, sweaty, or chemically funky.

acrid_funk.name: acrid_funk
acrid_funk.description: Harsh, chemical, or burned ferment note. Common in crash-roasted or badly stored lots.

green_bean.name: green_bean
green_bean.description: Raw vegetal note with grassy edge and high chlorophyll. Often cupped in underdeveloped or underwashed coffees.

grass.name: grass
grass.description: Sharp, green-cut note with clean but flat aftertaste. Common in underdeveloped washed roasts.

bell_pepper.name: bell_pepper
bell_pepper.description: Distinct green pepper note with sharp grassy bite. Found in some Ethiopian varietals or overwashed centrals.

snap_pea.name: snap_pea
snap_pea.description: Sweet-green pod flavour with soft vegetal edge. Found in fresh high-altitude washed coffees.

zucchini_skin.name: zucchini_skin
zucchini_skin.description: Waxy, raw vegetable peel note with dry edge. Found in slow-dry naturals or waterlogged washed lots.

cucumber.name: cucumber
cucumber.description: Clean green note with watery body and aromatic skin. Occasionally cupped in extremely fresh washed lots.

stemmy.name: stemmy
stemmy.description: Dry, fibrous vegetal note resembling broken stems. Found in low-density or defect-laden cups.

raw_nut.name: raw_nut
raw_nut.description: Undeveloped nut note with green fibrous shell. Found in immature beans or roast underdevelopment.

pea_shoot.name: pea_shoot
pea_shoot.description: Leafy-sweet vegetal note with green sprout lift. Found in soft-washed African cups.

tomato_leaf.name: tomato_leaf
tomato_leaf.description: Sharp, green-stemmed note with faintly sweet and pungent lift. Found in floral coffees or herb-adjacent ferment lots.

tea_leaf.name: tea_leaf
tea_leaf.description: Dry green-leaf note with subtle bitterness and aromatic lift. Found in floral washed Ethiopians and herbal cups.

arugula.name: arugula
arugula.description: Bitter-spicy green note with peppery lift. Rare but found in certain spicy washed lots or defected greens.

leaf_litter.name: leaf_litter
leaf_litter.description: Dry, dead-leaf note with slight musty edge. Found in low-quality greens or over-dried naturals.

plant_stem.name: plant_stem
plant_stem.description: Neutral woody-green note resembling cut plant stalks. Found in underdeveloped or hollow cups.

green_leafy.name: green_leafy
green_leafy.description: Generic green-leaf note with no floral expression. Found in washed African cups or when vegetal balance is present.

cut_flower_stem.name: cut_flower_stem
cut_flower_stem.description: Wet-stem aroma perceived when vegetal notes meet florals. Found in delicate, floral-washed cups with green lift.

dried_herb.name: dried_herb
dried_herb.description: Flat herbal-vegetal note lacking sweet oils. Common in flat naturals or dry-oxidized greens.

raw_potato.name: raw_potato
raw_potato.description: Starchy, earthy off-note with waxy texture. Associated with potato defect, especially in East African coffees.

cooked_potato.name: cooked_potato
cooked_potato.description: Soft, starchy, slightly sulfuric note. May occur in poorly roasted or over-wet processed lots.

boiled_greens.name: boiled_greens
boiled_greens.description: Overcooked vegetal note with sulfuric release and wet mouthfeel. Found in stale greens or wet-processing defects.

cooked_veg.name: cooked_veg
cooked_veg.description: Generic soft vegetal flavor resembling boiled greens or mushy squash. Perceived in overprocessed naturals.

chlorophyll.name: chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Bitter green-metallic note. Found in underdeveloped roasts or poorly sorted greens.

asparagus.name: asparagus
asparagus.description: Wet-green note with sulfur tip. Found in slow-dried coffees or green coffee age defects.

onion_skin.name: onion_skin
onion_skin.description: Dry, papery sulfur note. Found in old, poorly stored greens or defective anaerobic lots.

squash.name: squash
squash.description: Soft, sweet vegetal note with mushy body. Found in slow-dry naturals or aged coffees.

peanut_skin.name: peanut_skin
peanut_skin.description: Dry, papery nut husk note with bitter edges. Common in low-density lots or slightly underdeveloped roasts.

dark_chocolate.name: dark_chocolate
dark_chocolate.description: Bitter cocoa flavor with dry mouthfeel and deep roast influence. Common in medium-dark washed coffees.

toasted_hazelnut.name: toasted_hazelnut
toasted_hazelnut.description: Nutty-sweet note with dry toast edge and caramel warmth. Found in Brazil naturals and balanced blends.
